Articles.Content:
I added quite a few mods and deleted some that werent compatable after KSP told me and then I wasnt able to update one it told me to and have since forgot which one it was. My water is physically there, but visually I dont see it. I validated the game files and that didnt fix it. Looking for any help, thank you.

I have KSP recall, chatter, cryoengine, ctnlanderpack,docking port alignment indicator,easy vessel switch, endurance ship mod,. EVE, eve optimized engines, KAS,Kerbal alarm clock, kerbal planetary base systems, kerbal galaxy, kspie, mech jeb2, near future launch vehicle, scansat, scatterer, smartadapter

Scatterer.

Post edit: Same thing happened to me when I installed it. Once I saw it, I immediately uninstalled it cause' it weirded me out >.>

Edited August 14, 2020 by James M
